content.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE {VALUES ?card_uri {} { ?card_uri wdt:P7937 ?entity.} UNION { ?card_uri wdt:P7937 ?entity. } SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" }}
SELECT DISTINCT ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?card_uri {} SERVICE wikibase:label {bd:serviceParam wikibase:language 'en' . ?card_uri schema:description ?entityLabel.}}

SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE {VALUES ?card_uri {} { ?card_uri wdt:P175 ?entity.} UNION { ?card_uri wdt:P175 ?entity. } SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" }}

SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE {VALUES ?card_uri {} { ?card_uri wdt:P407 ?entity.} UNION { ?card_uri wdt:P407 ?entity. } SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" }}
PREFIX skosxl: <http://www.w3.org/2008/05/skos-xl#> PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/>  SELECT DISTINCT  ?entity WHERE {VALUES ?card_uri {}  ?card_uri  sdo:datePublished ?entity }

SELECT DISTINCT ?entity (YEAR(?entity) AS ?entityLabel) WHERE {VALUES ?card_uri {} { ?card_uri wdt:P577 ?entity.} UNION { ?card_uri wdt:P577 ?entity. } SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" }}

PREFIX skosxl: <http://www.w3.org/2008/05/skos-xl#> PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/>  SELECT DISTINCT  ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?card_uri {}  { ?card_uir  sdo:locationCreated ?location . ?location sdo:sameAs ?entity . ?location sdo:name ?entityLabel} UNION { ?card_uri  sdo:hasPart/sdo:locationCreated ?location . ?location sdo:sameAs ?entity . ?location sdo:name ?entityLabel}  }

PREFIX skosxl: <http://www.w3.org/2008/05/skos-xl#> PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/>  SELECT DISTINCT  ?p WHERE {VALUES ?card_uri {}   {?card_uri  sdo:genre ?entity . ?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm ?entityLabel;} UNION {?card_uri  sdo:hasPart/sdo:genre ?entity . ?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm ?entityLabel} }
SELECT DISTINCT ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?card_uri {} SERVICE wikibase:label {bd:serviceParam wikibase:language 'en' . ?card_uri schema:description ?entityLabel.}}
SELECT DISTINCT ?card_uri ?entity WHERE {VALUES ?card_uri {} ?card_uri wdt:P18 ?entity }
SELECT DISTINCT ?card_uri ?entity WHERE {VALUES ?card_uri {} ?card_uri wdt:P2716 ?entity .}
SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE {VALUES ?card_uri {} { ?card_uri wdt:P495 ?entity.} UNION { ?card_uri wdt:P740 ?entity. } SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" }}
SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE {VALUES ?card_uri {} { ?card_uri wdt:P279 ?entity.} SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" }}

PREFIX skosxl: <http://www.w3.org/2008/05/skos-xl#> PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE {VALUES ?card_uri {} { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> ;  sdo:genre ?card_uri ; sdo:genre ?entity. ?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm ?entityLabel . } UNION { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> .  ?programUri sdo:hasPart ?sceneUri. ?sceneUri sdo:genre ?card_uri ; sdo:genre ?entity. ?entity skos:prefLabel ?entityLabel .} FILTER(?entity != ?card_uri) BIND("is associated with" as ?rel)}
SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE {VALUES ?card_uri {} { ?card_uri wdt:P407 ?entity.} SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" }}
SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE {VALUES ?card_uri {} { ?card_uri wdt:P577 ?entity.} SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" }}

PREFIX skosxl: <http://www.w3.org/2008/05/skos-xl#> PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>  SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?card_uri {}  ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131>. ?programUri sdo:genre ?card_uri.{ ?programUri sdo:creator/sdo:creator ?entity .?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm ?entityLabel . } UNION { ?programUri sdo:hasPart ?sceneUri. ?sceneUri sdo:creator/sdo:creator ?entity . ?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm ?entityLabel .} }

PREFIX skosxl: <http://www.w3.org/2008/05/skos-xl#> PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>  SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE {VALUES ?card_uri {} ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131>.?programUri sdo:genre ?card_uri . { ?programUri sdo:byArtist/sdo:byArtist ?entity .?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm ?entityLabel .} UNION { ?programUri sdo:hasPart ?sceneUri. ?sceneUri sdo:byArtist/sdo:byArtist ?entity .  ?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm ?entityLabel . } }
SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?card_uri {} ?entity <https://schema.org/genre> ?starting_value ; rdfs:label ?entityLabel . }

PREFIX mtp: <http://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/meetups-ontology#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?entityLabel { VALUES ?card_uri {} ?card_uri rdf:type mtp:Participant ; mtp:hasAbstract ?entityLabel . }
SELECT DISTINCT ?entityLabel WHERE {VALUES ?card_uri {} SERVICE wikibase:label {bd:serviceParam wikibase:language 'en' . ?card_uri schema:description ?entityLabel.}}
SELECT DISTINCT ?card_uri ?entity WHERE {VALUES ?card_uri {} ?card_uri wdt:P18 ?entity }
SELECT DISTINCT ?card_uri ?entity WHERE {VALUES ?card_uri {} ?card_uri wdt:P10 ?entity }
SELECT DISTINCT ?card_uri ?entity WHERE {VALUES ?card_uri {} ?card_uri wdt:P51 ?entity }

PREFIX mtp: <http://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/meetups-ontology#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?card_uri { <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Yehudi_Menuhin> } ?s mtp:hasSubject ?card_uri ; mtp:hasParticipant ?participant ; mtp:hasType ?type .  FILTER (regex ( str (?type), str ("HM") ) ) . ?s mtp:hasParticipant ?aParticipantURI . ?aParticipantURI mtp:hasEntity ?entity .  ?entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel .  }

SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE {VALUES ?card_uri {}  { ?card_uri wdt:P19 ?entity. ?entity wdt:P31/wdt:P279* wd:Q702492 . BIND(str("has place of birth") AS ?rel) } UNION { ?card_uri wdt:P20 ?entity. ?entity wdt:P31/wdt:P279* wd:Q702492 . BIND(str("has place of death") AS ?rel) } UNION { ?card_uri wdt:P937 ?entity. ?entity wdt:P31/wdt:P279* wd:Q702492 . BIND(str("has work location") AS ?rel) } UNION { ?card_uri wdt:P740 ?entity. BIND(str("location of formation") AS ?rel)} UNION { ?card_uri wdt:P495 ?entity. BIND(str("has country of origin") AS ?rel)} . SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" } } ORDER BY ?entityLabel LIMIT 10

SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel ?rel ?inverse_rel WHERE {VALUES ?card_uri {}  ?card_uri ^wdt:P47 ?entity . ?entity wdt:P31/wdt:P279* wd:Q82794 . BIND(str("shares border with") AS ?inverse_rel) .  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" } }

SELECT DISTINCT ?card_uri ?entity WHERE { VALUES ?card_uri {} ?card_uri wdt:P51 ?entity }

PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/> SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE {VALUES ?card_uri {<http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q849957>} ?entity sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> . ?entity sdo:name ?entityLabel . {?entity sdo:locationCreated ?location . ?location sdo:sameAs ?card_uri.   }   UNION  {  ?entity sdo:hasPart/sdo:locationCreated ?location . ?location sdo:sameAs ?card_uri .  } }

PREFIX skosxl: <http://www.w3.org/2008/05/skos-xl#> PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>  SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE {VALUES ?card_uri {} ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> . { ?location sdo:sameAs ?card_uri .?programUri sdo:locationCreated ?location .?programUri (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator)/             (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator) ?entity .?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm ?entityLabel . }UNION{?location sdo:sameAs ?card_uri .?sceneUri sdo:locationCreated ?location . ?programUri sdo:hasPart ?sceneUri.?sceneUri  (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator)/(sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator) ?entity . ?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm ?entityLabel . } }

09.title: Albums from artists related to the place

content.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE {VALUES ?starting_value {} ?musician wdt:P31 wd:Q5; wdt:P740 ?starting_value. ?entity wdt:P175 ?musician ; rdfs:label ?label . ?musician rdfs:label ?musicianLabel . FILTER(LANG(?label) = "en") FILTER(LANG(?musicianLabel) = "en") BIND(CONCAT(?label, ' by ', ?musicianLabel) AS ?entityLabel)}
SELECT DISTINCT ?entityLabel WHERE {VALUES ?card_uri {} SERVICE wikibase:label {bd:serviceParam wikibase:language 'en' . ?card_uri schema:description ?entityLabel.}}
SELECT DISTINCT (CONCAT(UCASE(SUBSTR(?description, 1, 1)), LCASE(SUBSTR(?description, 2)) ) as ?entityLabel) WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} ?starting_value dc:description ?description . }
SELECT DISTINCT ?card_uri ?entity WHERE {VALUES ?card_uri {} ?card_uri wdt:P18 ?entity }
SELECT DISTINCT ?entity WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} ?starting_value a-cd:hasDocumentation/foaf:depiction ?entity. }
SELECT DISTINCT ?entity WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} ?starting_value a-cd:hasDocumentation/<https://w3id.org/italia/onto/SM/URL> ?entity. }
SELECT DISTINCT ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} ?starting_value <https://w3id.org/arco/ontology/musical-instrument/producesMusicalNote>/rdfs:label ?entityLabel. }
SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} ?starting_value a-cd:hasAuthor ?entity . ?entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel . }
SELECT DISTINCT (IF(STRBEFORE(?label, "-") = STRAFTER(?label, "-"), STRBEFORE(?label, "-"), ?label) AS ?entityLabel) WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} ?starting_value dc:date ?label . }

PREFIX clv: <https://w3id.org/italia/onto/CLV/> SELECT DISTINCT ?entity (CONCAT(?bellString, " - ", ?church, " - ", ?city) AS ?entityLabel) WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} ?starting_value a-cd:hasAuthor ?author . ?entity rdf:type a-dd:MusicalInstrument ; a-cd:hasAuthor ?author ; dc:coverage ?city ; a-loc:hasTimeIndexedTypedLocation/a-loc:atSite/rdfs:label ?church ; rdfs:label ?title ; dc:subject ?subject FILTER (str(?subject) = 'campana') . BIND (STRBEFORE(?title, " (") AS ?bellString) . FILTER (LANGMATCHES(LANG(?bellString), "it")) . FILTER (?entity != ?starting_value) . }
SELECT DISTINCT ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} ?starting_value dc:coverage ?entityLabel . }

SELECT DISTINCT (SUBSTR(?entityLabelToTrim, 8) as ?entityLabel) WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} ?starting_value a-loc:hasTimeIndexedTypedLocation/a-loc:hasLocationType a-loc:ProductionRealizationLocation ; a-loc:hasTimeIndexedTypedLocation/a-loc:atLocation/rdfs:label ?entityLabelToTrim . }
SELECT DISTINCT (SAMPLE(?label_to_format) AS ?entityLabel) WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} ?starting_value a-dd:hasMaterial/rdfs:label ?label_to_format. }
SELECT DISTINCT ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} ?starting_value a-dd:hasAffixedElement/a-dd:transcript ?entityLabel . }

SELECT DISTINCT (CONCAT(UCASE(SUBSTR(?entityLabel, 1, 1)), SUBSTR(?entityLabel, 2)) AS ?entityLabel) WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} ?starting_value a-dd:hasIconographicOrDecorativeApparatus/a-cd:subject ?entityLabel . }

SELECT DISTINCT ?entity (CONCAT(UCASE(SUBSTR(?subject, 1, 1)), SUBSTR(?subject, 2), " - ", ?church, " - ", ?city) AS ?entityLabel) WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} ?starting_value arco:isCulturalPropertyComponentOf ?entity . ?entity a-loc:hasTimeIndexedTypedLocation/a-loc:atSite/rdfs:label ?church ; dc:coverage ?city ; dc:subject ?subject FILTER (str(?subject) = 'concerto di campane'). }

14.title: Other bells in the same set

content.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?entity (CONCAT(?bellString, " - ", ?church, " - ", ?city) AS ?entityLabel) WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} ?starting_value arco:isCulturalPropertyComponentOf ?setOfBells . ?entity arco:isCulturalPropertyComponentOf ?setOfBells ; a-loc:hasTimeIndexedTypedLocation/a-loc:atSite/rdfs:label ?church ; rdfs:label ?title ; dc:coverage ?city ; dc:subject ?subject FILTER (str(?subject) = 'campana') . BIND (STRBEFORE(?title, " (") AS ?bellString) . FILTER (LANGMATCHES(LANG(?bellString), "it")) . FILTER (?starting_value != ?entity) . } ORDER BY ?starting_value

SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel {VALUES ?card_uri {} ?entity wdt:P1303 ?card_uri . ?entity wikibase:statements ?outcoming . {?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q5.} UNION {?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q215380 .} ?entity wikibase:sitelinks ?sitelinks . { SELECT (count(?s) AS ?incoming) ?entity WHERE {VALUES ?card_uri {} ?entity wdt:P1303 ?card_uri . ?s ?p ?entity .[] wikibase:directClaim ?p } GROUP BY ?entity } SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" . }. } ORDER BY DESC (?incoming)

PREFIX skosxl: <http://www.w3.org/2008/05/skos-xl#> PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/> SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE {VALUES ?card_uri {} ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> .{ ?programUri (sdo:byArtist|sdo:creator) ?role .?role sdo:roleName ?card_uri. ?role (sdo:byArtist|sdo:creator) ?entity.?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm  ?entityLabel . } UNION {?programUri sdo:hasPart/(sdo:byArtist|sdo:creator) ?role . ?role sdo:roleName ?card_uri. ?role (sdo:byArtist|sdo:creator) ?entity.?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm  ?entityLabel . } }

PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/> SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel  WHERE {VALUES ?card_uri {}   ?entity sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> .?entity sdo:name ?entityLabel . { ?entity sdo:byArtist/sdo:roleName ?card_uri . }UNION {?entity sdo:hasPart/sdo:byArtist/sdo:roleName ?card_uri .} }

content.label: Italian Catalogue of Cultural Heritage
content.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?entity WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} ?starting_value dc:source ?entity . FILTER(contains(str(?entity), 'https://catalogo.beniculturali.it')) }
SELECT DISTINCT ?entityLabel WHERE {VALUES ?card_uri {} ?card_uri <https://schema.org/description> ?entityLabel .}
SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE {VALUES ?card_uri {} ?card_uri <https://schema.org/audience> ?entity. ?entity <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#label> ?entityLabel .}
SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE {VALUES ?card_uri {} ?card_uri <https://schema.org/mainEntity> ?entity. ?entity <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#label> ?entityLabel .}

04.title: Useful links
04.description: Discover many other resources related to this creative work available on the web

content.label: Website
content.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?entity  WHERE {VALUES ?card_uri {} ?card_uri <https://schema.org/mainEntityOfPage> ?entity .}

content.label: Sample Resource
content.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?entity WHERE {VALUES ?card_uri {} ?card_uri <https://schema.org/workExample> ?entity .}

PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel FROM <http://data.open.ac.uk/context/led> WHERE { VALUES ?card_uri {} ?card_uri mo:performer ?entity . ?entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel .}

PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel FROM <http://data.open.ac.uk/context/led> WHERE { VALUES ?card_uri {} ?card_uri mo:instrument ?entity . ?entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel .}

PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX led: <http://led.kmi.open.ac.uk/term/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX c4dm: <http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#> SELECT (SAMPLE(?label) AS ?entityLabel) FROM <http://data.open.ac.uk/context/led> WHERE { VALUES ?card_uri {} ?experience a led:ListeningExperience ; <http://purl.org/dc/terms/subject> ?card_uri ; c4dm:place ?entity . ?entity rdfs:label ?label .}

PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel FROM <http://data.open.ac.uk/context/led> WHERE { VALUES ?card_uri {} ?card_uri mo:listener ?entity . ?entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel .}

PREFIX led: <http://led.kmi.open.ac.uk/term/>  SELECT DISTINCT ?entityLabel FROM <http://data.open.ac.uk/context/led> WHERE {VALUES ?card_uri {} ?experience a led:ListeningExperience ; <http://purl.org/dc/terms/subject> ?card_uri { ?experience led:has_evidence_text ?entityLabel } UNION { ?experience led:is_reported_in/rdf:value ?entityLabel } }
